DOC.detailed_description: Patient Selection 30 patient select meet follow criterion : Inclusion Criteria 1 . Have one non-molar tooth require extraction replace dental implant . The site must border least one tooth . 2 . Healthy male female least 18 year old . 3 . Patients must sign informed consent approve University Louisville Human Studies Committee . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Patients debilitate systemic disease , disease clinically significant effect periodontium . 2 . Presence history osteonecrosis jaw . 3 . Patients currently take IV bisphosphonates IV treatment bisphosphonates irrespective duration . 4 . Patients treat oral bisphosphonates three year . 5 . Patients allergy material medication use study . 6 . Patients need prophylactic antibiotic . 7 . Previous head neck radiation therapy . 8 . Chemotherapy previous 12 month . 9 . Patients long term NSAID steroid therapy . 10 . Pregnant patient .
